Text:
This is the second disc to the 2-disc special edition.

Each menu entry has been encoded to a separate file, and organized in folders for each sub menu.
I included a copy of MP4Box, and instructions on how to use it to concatenate the files.
Also there are batch scripts to automate the concatenation.

(I tried to add that to the description but when I click "Edit torrent" I just get a white page with "error" at the top-left)
Oh, and to get the join_scripts to work correctly, you need to right-click the .RAR and 'Extract Here' (not to some other folder).

Here's some more stuff I wanted to add to the description.
